Installation
============

Install ```statemodify``` using pip:

.. code-block:: console

  $ # statemodify requires python >= 3.8.
  $ pip install statemodify

You may also install ```statemodify``` from source.

.. code-block:: console

  $ git clone https://github.com/IMMM-SFA/statemodify.git
  $ cd statemodify
  $ pip install .
